title: Error with compound assignment  - explain error

content.description:
Consider the following code segment.
 int x = 0; // line 1
x++; // line 2
System.out.print(x); // line 3
x += 1; // line 4
System.out.print(x); // line 5
x *= 2; // line 6
System.out.print(x); // line 7
x *= 4; // line 8
System.out.print(x); // line 9

The code segment is intended to produce the following output. The code segment does not work as intended. 
 1248
content.question: Which of the following changes can be made so that the code segment works as intended?

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
